item.description:
*   ***Notes:***
    *   Register Request:
        *   Allowed countries just Egypt, input string must be capitalize like "Egypt".
        *   Example for allowed phone number syntax "+201004323202"
    *   Tokens:
        *   Refresh token expired after 30 day
        *   Access token expired after 1 day
    *   Only Logout request require authentication
